titles.title: Empowering Youth Through Summer Employment Act

Empowering Youth Through Summer Employment Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Empowering Youth Through Summer Employment Act
This bill amends the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to: (1) increase the authorization of appropriations for youth workforce investment activities (relating to migrant and seasonal workers) for FY2018-FY2020, and (2) extend such authorization through FY2022.
